response.original_title: The Valiant Never Taste of Death But Once
response.overview: A cattle-rancher with a passion for film is threatened by a group of criminals to surrender his treasured ranch, and decides to face them on his own. Why would one defend land to the death? This is the tale of a family-man turned hero of the so-called Mexican 'War on Drugs.'
response.title: The Valiant Never Taste of Death But Once
